request.description:
## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for signup into system.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/auth/signup

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| name | user name | true | string |
| email | user email | true | string |
| password | user password | true | string |

#### Note:

first user will register will register as admin after that will register as operator

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for login into system.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/auth/login

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| password | user password | true | string |
| email | user email | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for logout from system.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/auth/logout

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| token | refreshToken | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for generate new accessToken.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/auth/refresh-token

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| token | refreshToken | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for send rest password email.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/auth/rest-password

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| email | user email | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used for rest password. ## EndPoint: ##### /api/auth/rest-password/:token ## Request param: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | token | rest password
token gnreated from send email | true | string | ## Request body: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | password | new password | true | string |

item.name: user

request.description:
## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for get user.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/users/:id

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | user id | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used get many users ## EndPoint: ##### /api/users ## Request query: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | limit | records number ber requset.
defulte = 10 | false | number | | page | page number.
defulte = 1 | false | number | | name | user name | false | string | | email | user email | false | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for update crruent user data.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/users

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| name | user name | false | string |
| email | user email | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used for create a new user. ## EndPoint: ##### /api/users ## Request body: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | name | user name | true | string | | email | user email | true | string | | password | user password | true | string | | role | user role
valid values (
admin ,operator
) | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for update user data.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/users/:id

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | user id | true | number |

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| name | user name | false | string |
| email | user email | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used for update user role. ## EndPoint: ##### /api/users/:id ## Request param: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | id | user id | true | number | ## Request body: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | role | user role
valid values (
admin ,operator
)e | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for delete user.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/users/:id

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | user id | true | number |

item.description: API manages dynamic users records CRUD opreations

request.description:
## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for create a new entity

## EndPoint:

##### /api/entities

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| name | the entity name | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for rename an exist entity

## EndPoint:

##### /api/entities

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| entity | name of the current entity | true | string |
| newName | entity new name | true | true |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used for drop or delete an exist entity ## EndPoint: ##### /api/entities/:entity ## Request param: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | entity | name of the entity.
ex: "borrow" | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used for get all entities ## EndPoint: ##### /api/entities ## Request param: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | entity | name of the entity.
ex: "borrow" | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used for create or assign new attributes to a specific entity ## EndPoint: ##### /api/attributes ## Request body: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | entity | the entity name | true | string | | attribute | lest of attributes object options | true | array | | type | attribute option.
valid values : (
STRING, INTEGER,
FLOAT,
DATE
BOOLEAN
) | true | string | | required | attribute option.
set of this attribute will be required or not | true | boolean | | name | attribute option.
name of the attribute | true | string | | ref | attribute option.
name of the reference entity.
used for set reference entity "foreign Key" | false | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for create or assign new attributes to a specific entity

## EndPoint:

##### /api/attributes/rename

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| entity | the entity name | true | string |
| attribute | attribute name | true | string |
| newName | new attribute name | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for delete attribute from a specific entity

## EndPoint:

##### /api/attributes/:entity/:attribute

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| entity | the entity name | true | string |
| attribute | attribute name | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for get attributes for a specific entity

## EndPoint:

##### /api/attributes/:entity

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| entity | the entity name | true | string |

item.name: Model

request.description:
## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for create a new record for a specific entity

## EndPoint:

##### /api/model/:entity

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| entity | the entity name | true | string |

## Request body:

body will be from custom attributes created for the entity

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for update a record form a specific entity

## EndPoint:

##### /api/model/:entity/:id

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| entity | the entity name | true | string |
| id | record ID | true | number |

## Request body:

body will be from custom attributes created for the entity

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for get a record form a specific entity

## EndPoint:

##### /api/model/:entity/:id

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| entity | the entity name | true | string |
| id | record ID | true | number |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used for get many records form a specific entity ## EndPoint: ##### /api/model/:entity ## Request param: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | entity | the entity name | true | string | ## Request query: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | limit | records number ber requset.
defulte = 10 | false | number | | page | page number.
defulte = 1 | false | number | #### Notes: you can use entity custom attrubites as request query param to fillter results

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for delete a record form a specific entity

## EndPoint:

##### /api/model/:entity/:id

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| entity | the entity name | true | string |
| id | record ID | true | number |

item.description: API manages dynamic entity records CRUD opreations
